verses.text_plain: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.
verses.verse_html:
1Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast. ▼
▼ Al–taschith: or, Destroy not
 , ▼
▼ Michtam: or, A golden Psalm

tokens.text: in thee: yea, in the shadow

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Al–taschith: or, Destroy not
▼ Michtam: or, A golden Psalm

verses.text_plain: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.
verses.verse_html: 2I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.

verses.text_plain: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.
verses.verse_html:
3He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth. ▼
▼ from the…: or, he reproacheth him that

tokens.text: of him that would swallow me up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ from the…: or, he reproacheth him that
footnotes.body_html: ▼ from the…: or, he reproacheth him that

verses.text_plain: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.
verses.verse_html: 4My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.

tokens.text: them that are set on fire

verses.text_plain: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.
verses.verse_html: 5Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.

verses.text_plain: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 6They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.

verses.text_plain: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.
verses.verse_html:
7My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise. ▼
▼ fixed: or, prepared

verses.text_plain: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
verses.verse_html: 8Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

verses.text_plain: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.
verses.verse_html: 9I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.

verses.text_plain: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.
verses.verse_html: 10For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.

verses.text_plain: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
verses.verse_html: 11Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
